page.title: 05SOME FACTS _ SKELMERSDALE
page.content: The age groupings in the town as a whole are : Aged under 5 years 9.3% 5-15 years 21% Aged 16-59 years 59.7% Over 60 10% In this survey block are some 4000+ households. They contain 4000 persons in full time employment and 700 part time. There are 1000 people seeking work and 1300 retired. Some 2400 children are of school age and 800 younger than this. There are 1212 houses for rent and 1019 owner occupied homes in the "new" category. A further 2053 houses were here prior to the "New Town". Outside the boundaries of Skelmersdale the property is mainly farm dwellings,and the small hamlet of Westhead which has old and new houses.
